subject: Deaths (Fatalities)
Fires and Firefighters
Baseball
History
lead_paragraph: Bill Shannon, a baseball historian, author and an official scorer at Yankees and Mets games for decades, died in an early morning house fire in West Caldwell, N.J.
snippet: Bill Shannon, a baseball historian, author and an official scorer at Yankees and Mets games for decades, died in an early morning house fire in West Caldwell, N.J.
